text: Jeffrey E. "Jeff" Cardoni (born January 1972) is an American composer. He can play many different instruments. He studied classical piano before playing drums and guitar in many bands. He was in the rock band Alien Crime Syndicate for a short time. After graduating James M. Coughlin High School, Cardoni studied engineering at Pennsylvania State University between 1988 and 1991.http://www.linkedin.com/pub/jeff- cardoni/5/59/ab6http://www.artandliving.com/jm/us/creators/music/140-jeff- cardoni-a-kevin-kiner He is best known for his work on television projects such as CSI: Miami, The Defenders, The League, and movie scores, such as Just Friends, Firehouse Dog, Miss March, Open Season 3 and Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay. Cardoni performed the music for Open Season 3. ==Early life== Cardoni was born in January 1970. ==Discography== ===Film scores=== *Firehouse Dog *Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay *Just Friends *Miss March *Open Season 3 ==Awards and nominations== He has won many awards from the American Society of Composers, Artists and Publishers (ASCAP) for his musical scores on television. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American composers
title: Jeff Cardoni
